metadata.title: ESRS Data Points Catalog
metadata.description: Comprehensive catalog of all ESRS data points from the EU Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive

data_points.name: Gross Scope 1 GHG emissions
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E1-6 Gross Scopes 1, 2, 3 and Total GHG emissions
data_points.description: Total gross Scope 1 GHG emissions in tonnes of CO2 equivalent, covering direct emissions from owned or controlled sources
data_points.calculation_method: Sum of all direct GHG emissions from stationary combustion, mobile combustion, process emissions, and fugitive emissions

data_points.name: Gross Scope 2 GHG emissions (location-based)
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E1-6 Gross Scopes 1, 2, 3 and Total GHG emissions
data_points.description: Total gross location-based Scope 2 GHG emissions in tonnes of CO2 equivalent from purchased electricity, heat, steam, and cooling
data_points.calculation_method: Purchased energy × grid average emission factor

data_points.name: Gross Scope 2 GHG emissions (market-based)
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E1-6 Gross Scopes 1, 2, 3 and Total GHG emissions
data_points.description: Total gross market-based Scope 2 GHG emissions reflecting contractual instruments (RECs, PPAs)

data_points.name: Gross Scope 3 GHG emissions
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E1-6 Gross Scopes 1, 2, 3 and Total GHG emissions
data_points.description: Total gross Scope 3 GHG emissions across all 15 categories
scope_3_categories: Category 12: End-of-life treatment of sold products

data_points.name: Total GHG emissions
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E1-6 Gross Scopes 1, 2, 3 and Total GHG emissions
data_points.description: Total GHG emissions (Scope 1 + Scope 2 + Scope 3)

data_points.name: Total energy consumption
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E1-5 Energy consumption and mix
data_points.description: Total energy consumption from renewable and non-renewable sources

data_points.name: Renewable energy consumption
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E1-5 Energy consumption and mix
data_points.description: Total energy consumption from renewable sources

data_points.name: Renewable energy percentage
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E1-5 Energy consumption and mix
data_points.description: Percentage of total energy from renewable sources

data_points.name: GHG intensity per revenue
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E1-6 Gross Scopes 1, 2, 3 and Total GHG emissions
data_points.description: GHG emissions intensity per unit of revenue

data_points.name: GHG removal and carbon credits
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E1-7 GHG removals and GHG mitigation projects
data_points.description: GHG removals and carbon credits from mitigation projects

data_points.name: Emissions of air pollutants
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E2-4 Pollution of air, water and soil
data_points.description: Emissions to air of: NOx, SOx, Particulate Matter (PM2.5, PM10), and other significant pollutants

data_points.name: Emissions of ozone-depleting substances
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E2-4 Pollution of air, water and soil
data_points.description: Emissions of ozone-depleting substances (ODS)

data_points.name: Emissions to water
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E2-4 Pollution of air, water and soil
data_points.description: Total discharge of priority substances and nutrients to water bodies

data_points.name: Emissions to soil
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E2-4 Pollution of air, water and soil
data_points.description: Discharge of pollutants to soil

data_points.name: Substances of concern produced or used
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E2-5 Substances of concern and substances of very high concern
data_points.description: Production and use of substances of concern (SoC) and substances of very high concern (SVHC)

data_points.name: Total water consumption
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E3-4 Water consumption
data_points.description: Total water consumption across all operations

data_points.name: Water consumption in water-stressed areas
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E3-4 Water consumption
data_points.description: Water consumption in areas of high or extremely high water stress

data_points.name: Water withdrawals
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E3-4 Water consumption
data_points.description: Total water withdrawals by source (surface water, groundwater, seawater, produced water, third-party water)

data_points.name: Water discharge
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E3-4 Water consumption
data_points.description: Total water discharge to surface water, groundwater, seawater, and third parties

data_points.name: Water recycling and reuse
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E3-4 Water consumption
data_points.description: Total water recycled and reused

data_points.name: Sites located in or near biodiversity-sensitive areas
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E4-5 Impact metrics related to biodiversity and ecosystems change
data_points.description: Number and area of sites in or near protected areas and areas of high biodiversity value

data_points.name: Land use change
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E4-5 Impact metrics related to biodiversity and ecosystems change
data_points.description: Extent of land use and land use change

data_points.name: Species at risk affected by operations
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E4-5 Impact metrics related to biodiversity and ecosystems change
data_points.description: Number of IUCN Red List species and national conservation list species affected by operations

data_points.name: Total waste generated
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E5-5 Resource inflows and outflows
data_points.description: Total waste generated in tonnes

data_points.name: Hazardous waste
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E5-5 Resource inflows and outflows
data_points.description: Total hazardous waste generated

data_points.name: Non-hazardous waste
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E5-5 Resource inflows and outflows
data_points.description: Total non-hazardous waste generated

data_points.name: Waste diverted from disposal
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E5-5 Resource inflows and outflows
data_points.description: Total waste diverted from disposal (recycled, reused, composted)

data_points.name: Waste recycling rate
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E5-5 Resource inflows and outflows
data_points.description: Percentage of waste recycled

data_points.name: Material inflows
data_points.disclosure_requirement: E5-5 Resource inflows and outflows
data_points.description: Total material inflows (products and materials, packaging, other)

data_points.name: Total workforce
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S1-6 Characteristics of the undertaking's employees
data_points.description: Total number of employees (headcount and FTE)

data_points.name: Employees by gender
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S1-6 Characteristics of the undertaking's employees
data_points.description: Number of employees by gender (male, female, other/not disclosed)

data_points.name: Employees by region
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S1-6 Characteristics of the undertaking's employees
data_points.description: Number of employees by region/country

data_points.name: Employees by contract type
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S1-6 Characteristics of the undertaking's employees
data_points.description: Employees by contract type (permanent, temporary)

data_points.name: Employee turnover rate
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S1-6 Characteristics of the undertaking's employees
data_points.description: Employee turnover rate

data_points.name: Gender pay gap
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S1-16 Remuneration metrics (pay gap and total remuneration)
data_points.description: Gender pay gap (unadjusted)

data_points.name: Training hours per employee
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S1-13 Training and skills development metrics
data_points.description: Average training hours per employee per year

data_points.name: Work-related injuries
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S1-14 Health and safety metrics
data_points.description: Number of work-related injuries

data_points.name: Work-related fatalities
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S1-14 Health and safety metrics
data_points.description: Number of work-related fatalities

data_points.name: Lost time injury frequency rate (LTIFR)
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S1-14 Health and safety metrics
data_points.description: Lost time injury frequency rate
data_points.calculation_method: (Number of lost time injuries / Total hours worked) × 1,000,000

data_points.name: Workers in value chain at risk of child labor
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S2-4 Taking action on material impacts on value chain workers
data_points.description: Number of workers in value chain at significant risk of child labor

data_points.name: Workers in value chain at risk of forced labor
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S2-4 Taking action on material impacts on value chain workers
data_points.description: Number of workers in value chain at significant risk of forced labor

data_points.name: Communities affected by operations
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S3-4 Taking action on material impacts on affected communities
data_points.description: Number of affected communities and stakeholders

data_points.name: Indigenous peoples affected
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S3-4 Taking action on material impacts on affected communities
data_points.description: Number of indigenous peoples and communities affected by operations

data_points.name: Product safety incidents
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S4-4 Taking action on material impacts on consumers and end-users
data_points.description: Number of incidents of non-compliance concerning health and safety impacts of products and services

data_points.name: Product recalls
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S4-4 Taking action on material impacts on consumers and end-users
data_points.description: Number of product recalls

data_points.name: Data privacy complaints
data_points.disclosure_requirement: S4-4 Taking action on material impacts on consumers and end-users
data_points.description: Number of substantiated complaints concerning breaches of customer privacy and data security

data_points.name: Convictions for corruption and bribery
data_points.disclosure_requirement: G1-4 Incidents of corruption and bribery
data_points.description: Number of convictions and fines for violations of anti-corruption and anti-bribery laws

data_points.name: Anti-corruption training
data_points.disclosure_requirement: G1-4 Incidents of corruption and bribery
data_points.description: Percentage of employees trained on anti-corruption policies

data_points.name: Political contributions
data_points.disclosure_requirement: G1-5 Political influence and lobbying activities
data_points.description: Total monetary value of political contributions

data_points.name: Fines for regulatory non-compliance
data_points.disclosure_requirement: G1-6 Payment practices
data_points.description: Total monetary value of significant fines and sanctions for non-compliance with laws and regulations
